DOC.brief_title: Comparing Bubble Ventilator Nasal CPAP Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: There various method generate pressure need Nasal CPAP . Some neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) use underwater bubbling system others use ventilator generate pressure . There right wrong way generate pressure method approve accepted . The aim study compare two system Nasal CPAP place baby define time period review infant 's vital sign . DOC.criteria: Neonates 2632 week gestational age Nasal CPAP least 48hrs fraction inspire oxygen ( FiO2 ) < = 0.3 . Parental consent obtain prior enrollment . Infants severe congenital anomaly , airway chest wall deformity , pulmonary hypoplasia , congenital heart disease , neurologic abnormality include severe intraventricular hemorrhage ( IVH ) need surgery eg . necrotizing enterocolitis exclude study . Any infant genetic/chromosomal abnormality exclude .
